Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

Class RSGroupAdminClient

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup.RSGroupAdminClient
@Deprecated @Private public class RSGroupAdminClient extends Object
Deprecated.
Keep it here only for tests, using Admin instead.
Client used for managing region server group information.

    • moveTables

      public void moveTables(Set<TableName> tables, String targetGroup) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Move given set of tables to the specified target RegionServer group. This will unassign all of a table's region so it can be reassigned to the correct group.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • moveServersAndTables

      public void moveServersAndTables(Set<Address> servers, Set<TableName> tables, String targetGroup) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Move given set of servers and tables to the specified target RegionServer group.
      Parameters:
      servers - set of servers to move
      tables - set of tables to move
      targetGroup - the target group name
      Throws:
      IOException - if moving the server and tables fail

    • removeServers

      public void removeServers(Set<Address> servers) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Remove decommissioned servers from rsgroup. 1. Sometimes we may find the server aborted due to some hardware failure and we must offline the server for repairing. Or we need to move some servers to join other clusters. So we need to remove these servers from the rsgroup. 2. Dead/recovering/live servers will be disallowed.
      Parameters:
      servers - set of servers to remove
      Throws:
      IOException
